title: Ukrainian Soldiers Entering Kherson Are Greeted With Joy
description: After months of Russian occupation, residents said the moment recalled being liberated from the Nazis in World War II. But there was also fear about further Russian attacks.
dc:creator: Marc Santora, Anna Lukinova and Maria Varenikova
media:description: Social media posts on Friday showed scenes of joy in the Kherson area, including the removal of a poster saying, “Russia is here forever.”
